column1: Security: How to land a thesis and what to expect.
column2:
Interested to know more about security and options for a security related bachelor project in Germany? Join us on Wednsday in H2, 3rd slot to learn more, and hear about some student's previous experiences. 

Content: 
1) What is information security?
2) What are the current security fields?
3) How can I get a bachelor thesis in security in Germany?

The Wait is OVER! 🔥💥

We are extremely glad to announce the launch of GDG New Cairo at GUC online members recruitment. 🙈🎉🎊

If you would like to be a part of GDG's growing community and help spread awaresness about the latest and greates in technology, here is your chance! 🙌🏻

We at GDG strive to put the latest technology into use to develop helpful, useful and entetaining stuff, to maintain a community which is up to date with the current technological scene.

GDG New Cairo at GUC is a subchapter from GDG New Cairo focused on the German University in Cairo community.

You can choose to join our team whichever way you see fit trhough one of the following committees:

The Creative Directory
+ Directory Roles:
- Thinking of good ideas to deliver the knowledge about the latest technologies to the people.
- Coming up with ideas related to event and activities tackling the consumers, and making them understand more about the current technological scene and companies strategies and goals.
- Searching for the latest developers technology and organizing sessions and workshops for it.

Social Media and Marketing Committee
+ Committee Roles:
- Planning on-ground and social media marketing campaigns for     the club’s activities and events.
- Administering the club’s social media accounts.
- Doing SWOT analysis on a regular basis, with a marketing segmentation report.
- Creating advertising plans for the club’s overall image, on-campus, off-campus, and on social media.
- Maintaining the image, identity, and branding of the club through creative ideas.

Public Relations Committee
+ Committee Roles:
- Organising the “Marketing and Advertising” on-ground campaigns, incoordination with them.
- Organising the “Fundraising and Sponsorships” fundraising events on campus, incoordination with them. 
- Participating in implementing the “Build Cool Stuff” activities and events, incoordination with them.
- Responsible for the internal and external relations of the club, with other organisations, clubs, and groups.
- Creating partnerships with other organisations or groups that will benefit the club.
- Responsible for the approvals and permissions with the university administration.

People Operations Committee
+ Committee Roles:
- Evaluating the members through an evaluation system.
-Regular documentations of the events and progress, through reports and surveys.
- Updating the members with the latest news.
- Motivating the members and developing techniques to increase their commitment.
- Responsible for the development process of the members through sessions, trainers, and workshops in coordination.    
- Maintaining our fun and cool culture in the club.

Illustrations Committee
+ Committee Roles:
- Responsible for the branding theme and identity of the club.
- Designing various graphic designs for our activities, events, items, and campaigns.
- Responsible for the artistic touch in the club.

Media Committee
+ Committee Roles:
- Responsible for the branding theme and identity of the club.
- Responsible for all the photography and videography (video 
editing) of the club.
- Covering all of our various activities and events in terms of photography and videography.

Fundraising and Sponsorships
+ Committee Roles:
- Responsible for the funding resources of the club through making deals and offers with various companies to be our sponsors.
- Brainstorming and planning for fundraising events on campus.
- Coordinating with “Public Relations and Communications” on hosting the fundraising events on campus.
- Creating the club's benefit package to be delivered to our future sponsors when contacting them.
- Determining any financial issues inside the chapter, and the ways to overcome it.
- Creating a database of contacts regarding sponsors.

Logistics and Coordination
+ Committee Roles:
- Buying all the required materials needed for our activities and events, with the reasonable quality and price.
- Brainstorming and implementing the annual club package for the members, alongside any package required for any activity or event.
- Responsible for the implementation of the club's booths.
- Creating a database of contacts regarding suppliers and printing centers



You can register through the following link:
https://goo.gl/8WtnkG

column1: S0: Recruitment | GDG New Cairo at GUC
column2:
We are extremely glad to announce the launch of GDG New Cairo at GUC - Season 0: Members Recruitment.

GDG New Cairo at GUC is a subchapter from GDG New Cairo focused on the German University in Cairo community.

GDG focuses on spreading awareness about the latest technologies in our community, so people can benefit their community by developing useful, helpful, and entertaining stuff.

We aim to mix technology with fantasy in a thrilling, extraordinary, and epic atmosphere.

GDG New Cairo at GUC is divided into 3 main directories:

- Build Cool Stuff 
1. Timaeus
2. Critias
3. Hermocrates 

- Do Cool Stuff
1. People Operations
2. Inspirations 
3. Marketing and Advertising
4. Public Relations and Communications
5. Illustrations and Photography

- Get Cool Stuff
1. Logistics and Coordination 
2. Fundraising and Sponsorships 

We are currently recruiting new members for Season 0: Generating... which focuses on Do Cool Stuff and Get Cool Stuff directories.

The recruitment process is as follows:

Apply through the following form: http://gdgnewcairo.org/online-recruitment/

You will receive an e-mail later to reserve your interview slot.

For any inquiries, kindly contact us at: hr@guc.gdgnewcairo.org

GDG New Cairo is proudly presenting its first workshop for Android Development titled "Kreate, Kompile, Kotlin." using the new Android first-class language "Kotlin" at Via Coworking Space in Nasr City. 🔥🙈

Agenda:
4:00 pm - 4:30 pm: Registration
4:30 pm - 5:00 pm: GDG Introduction
5:00 pm - 6:00 pm: Introduction to Kotlin by Tarek Abdul-Kader
6:00 pm - 6:30 pm: Coffee Break
6:30 pm - 7:30 pm: Kotlin for Android Workshop by Shady Selim
7:30 pm - 8:00 pm: Networking & Closing

Registration Link: https://www.meetup.com/gdgnewcairo/events/241450829/
⚠️ By joining our Meetup event, you will be automatically added to the attendees list.

For more information, don't hesitate to contact us through our Facebook messages.

#GDG #Android #Kreate #Kompile #Kotlin #Workshop

[Arabic text below]

NOTE : THIS EVENT IS FOR GUCians ONLY!

Have you ever wanted to learn a new skill then voices inside your head told you that you can't ...  that it's too late! NO it's never too late. 
You could learn a new skill everyday 😃

Thoughts..emotions.. 
The repetition of small changes leads to neural pathways. Why do you think we behave differently nowadays than 10 years ago? It’s because our brains are constantly being shaped. 

This is called "Neuroplasticity".

It’s the brain's ability to reorganize itself by forming new neural connections throughout life. The nerve cells’ activities are adjusted in response to new situations. And more to learn from our great speaker Ahmed Samir who is known for his famous youtube channel Egychology - ايجيكولوجي!

-Waiting for you all on Saturday 24th of February.
-Time: 3:30 pm (5th slot)
-Location: H16
-Please register through: Deadline rached


تنبيه هام : الحدث لطلاب الجامعة الألمانية فقط!

حاولت قبل كدا تتعلم حاجة جديه و دماغك كانت رافضه الفكره و بتقولك خلاص كدا كفايه عليك تعليم ؟ لا مش كفايه! 
انت ممكن تتعلم حجات كتير جديده كل يوم بشكل انت نفسك متتخيلوش

التفكير و العاطفه. تكرار حجات صغيره في حياتنا بيئدي لمشاكل مختلفه في السلوك العصبي لينا. تفتكر ليه دلوقتي واخدين فكره اننا كنا روشين جدا و احنا صغيرين مع ان دا كان صح 100% و انت صغير؟ دا ببساطه لأم المخ بيستوعب اكتر من اللي حوليه و بيكون لنفسه شصخيه مستقله و شكل معين يبقي انت عليه.

كل دا ملخصه في كلمه واحده اسمها "Neuroplasticity" !

هي قدره المخ علي استيعاب نفسه عن طريق تكوين خلايه جديده و توصيلات مختلفه بين خلايه المخ و بعضها بتكون شبكه. الشبكه دي هي اللي بتتحكم في تصرفتنا و شخصيتنا و تعاملنا مع المواقف المختلفه و اكتر هتعرفه مع Ahmed Samir صاحب اكبر قنوات اليوتيوب في الشرف الأوسط Egychology - ايجيكولوجي 

-الحدث هيكون يوم السبت 24 فبراير
-الساعه 3:30 مساءَ
-المكان H16 
-للحجز : Done

column1: Egyptian Engineering Day 2017 | يوم الهندسة المصري ٢٠١٧
column2:
Success is not a matter of coincidence, but a mixture of hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and passion.

It doesn't matter what your passion is; engineering, business, art or entrepreneurship, it is always necessary to "Widen Your Horizon", see the wider image, consider all the variables, and have a wide knowledge of many fields. Only then is when your mind is enlightened, and is capable of achieving more.

EED 2017 presents different categories of engineering and entrepreneurship tracks, each with a number of projects that cover its various topics, to expose you to a diversity of options whatever your passion is.

All you need now is courage; courage to push your whole potential towards your destination. If you have this courage, you should join us in this year's episode of EED and register your seat here: http://visitors.eed.eg/

 النجاح مش مجرد صدفة، النجاح إنك تدرس وتتعلم وتشتغل بجد، إنك تضحى بحاجات كتير عشان توصل للي أنت عايزه، و إنك تبقى شغوف بالحاجة دي.

شغفك ده ممكن يكون  زي إنك تشتغل في شركة وتحقق ذاتك وتسيب بصمة قوية في مكانك، أو إنك تكون رائد أعمال، ويكون ليك شركة خاصة بيك وتتحمل مسئوليتها الكاملة، أو تكون مهتم  بفن أو مجال معيّن وتبدع فيه. 

في كل الأحوال محتاجين نشوف الصورة الأكبر ونهتم بكل المتغيرات، ونعرف كل جديد عن كافة المجالات، وبالتالي نوسع مداركنا وآفاقنا، ونقدر نعرف كويس الطريق اللي احنا فعلًا مهتمين نمشي فيه في حياتنا، وكل اللي هتحتاجه مع ده شوية شجاعة.

خد الخطوة وسجل في يوم الهندسة المصري ٢٠١٧ اللي رسالته السنة دي إنه يعرفك إيه هي الطرق المتاحة قدامك، ومميزات وتحديات كل طريق ممكن تمشي فيه، سواء هندسي أو غيره؛ عشان تقدر تقرر وتختار.
للتسجيل :  http://visitors.eed.eg/
يوم الهندسة المصري ٢٠١٧ - آفاق غير محدودة !

أنا و أنت عارفين إن احنا كعرب لينا بصمة قوية في التطور العلمي عامةً،بس الفكرة إن احنا نفسنا نرجع نساهم زي زمان و نعمل كمجتمع لا كأفراد محبين للعلم محاوليين الإبداع قدر المستطاع... 

لو نفسك تسمع الموضوع ده من وجهة نظر شخص مثقف على درجة علمية كبيرة مثل دكتور علاء بدل من البكاء على الأطلال لإن هدفنا نعالج المشكلة ديه  :D

هتنورونا!

Are you a marvel fan ? If yes, check this out !!
Nawwar is bringing you MARVEL to the GUC on Tuesday the 17th of April 2018 . 
From 5:30 pm to 8:30 pm .
All you should do is grab your ticket and enter 

>>>>>>>>(tickets are for FREE)<<<<<<<<  
——————
With all marvel superheroes’ fans mind blown by the technology applied in those marvelous movies , it’s no wonder that we are all asking if the technology behind these movies can even exist ? If it’s true, is it applicable ? If yes, then HOW ? And how far are we from this kind of technology ?

We know what you’re thinking when you see those movies.
We know that you are overwhelmed by the technology behind them. 

At MARVEL deTECHted superheroes event we are going to be answering all these mind-boggling questions from the perspectives of different engineering fields.

Speakers and Host will be announced soon !   
 ——————
 For GUCians :
You should fill the form (link is below) and pick up your tickets (tickets are for free) from Nawwar GUC booth at the platform from Saturday 14/4 to Monday 16/4. 

Entrance :
-from 4:00 pm to 5:30 pm.
-no entrance permitted without a ticket.
GUCians Ticket : https://goo.gl/1XZtJ2
———————
For Non GUCians :
You MUST fill the form ( link is below ) and wait for the confirmation email. 
You will then receive your ticket by mail, which you need to print or screenshot and bring along on the day of the event.
If you don’t receive it please inform us.

 Entrance : 
-from 4:00 pm to 5:30pm .
-National ID. 
-no entrance permitted without a ticket. 
Non-Gucians Ticket : https://goo.gl/hmjKbc
————————

بتحب عالم مارڤيل؟ يبقى لازم تقرا الكلام ده 
نوَّر جابتلك عالم مارڤيل لحد عندك في الجامعة الألمانية يوم (الثلاثاء) الموافق (١٧ أبريل ٢٠١٨) من الساعة ٥:٣٠ مساءً إلى الساعة ٨:٣٠ مساءً.
——————
إحضار تذكرتك شرط أساسي لدخول الإيڤنت (الحضور مجّاني)
——————
لكل محبّي أفلام الأبطال الخارقين لمارڤيل والمنبهرين دايماً بكل التكنولوچيا الموجودة والمستخدَمة في الأفلام العظيمة دي، أكيد خَطَر على بالك سؤال "هل التكنولوچيا دي موجودة في الواقع؟" ولو فعلاً موجودة يبقى السؤال "ازاي نستخدمها عشان نحول الواقع بتاعنا لعالم مبهر زي الأفلام؟" و "هل احنا لسة بعيد عن تحقيقها ولا العلم قرّبلها؟!"

احنا عارفين انت بتفكر في ايه و متأكدين إنك زيّنا مُنبهر بالتكنولوچيا الموجودة في الأفلام دي!

ولذا، قرّرنا نحن -نوَّر- إننا نجمّع كل محبّي أفلام الأبطال الخارقين في مكان واحد ونوضّح كل الأسئلة الغامضة اللي فكّروا فيها ونجاوب عليها من وجهات نظر هندسية مختلفة في MARVEL deTECHted.

تابعونا عشان تعرفوا مين هيستضيف اليوم ومين المتحدثين اللي هيكونوا معانا..   
 ——————
لطلاب الجامعة الألمانية:
الاشتراك عن طريق الرابط التالي ، وقم بزيارتنا في ال platform لاستلام تذكرة الدخول (التذاكر مجانية) 
https://goo.gl/1XZtJ2 
الدخول:
- من الساعة ٤ مساءً إلى الساعة ٥:٣٠ مساءً.
- لا يسمح بالدخول بدون تذكرة.
———————
للحضور من خارج الجامعة الألمانية:
الاشتراك عن طريق الرابط التالي وستصلك رسالة التأكيد الآلية على بريدك الإلكتروني. تحتوي رسالة التأكيد على تذكرة دخولك، برجاء طبعها و إحضارها يوم الإيڤنت.
https://goo.gl/hmjKbc
الدخول:
- من الساعة ٤ مساءً إلى الساعة ٥:٣٠ مساءً.
- لا يسمح بالدخول بدون تذكرة.

فرقة مسرح الجامعة الالمانية بالقاهرة GUC TCS
 
تقدم عرضها المسرحي " الجســر " 
( المسرحية الحاصلة على جائزة أفضل عرض بتصويت الجمهور في المهرجان القومي للمسرح المصري -الدورة العاشرة- .. و المشاركة في مهرجان القاهرة الدولي للمسرح المعاصر و التجريبي ) 

من تأليف : جورج ثيوتيكا و إخراج : وليد طلعت

"الجسر" في الجامعة الألمانية بالقاهرة:
في H4

- العرض الأول 
الاربعاء ٨/١١ الساعة ٦ مساءً .. لطلاب الجامعة الألمانية والعاملين فقط
 
- العرض الثاني والثالث  
الخميس ٩/١١ الساعة ٦ مساءً .. لطلاب الجامعة و الجمهور من خارج الجامعة 
و الساعة ٨ مساءً .. لطلاب الجامعة والجمهور من خارج الجامعة 

الحضور مجاناً .. للطلاب والجمهور خارج الجامعة 
علي الجمهور من خارج الجامعة ملئ هذه الاستمارة للدخول مجاناً يوم العرض :
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfm1On_C9BJ6O2Ev46HDEKAknEb71M_GO9CmIWHn0lvSwCN_g/viewform

column1: Cairokee & Tahra at GUC - GUCians ONLY
column2:
GUC Music Academy in cooperation with Hi Wave Events Dubai & Cairo and sponsored by Scratch Production Mostafa Sorour presents:
Cairokee & طاهرة - Tahra @ GUC
Opening act by DJ Emile 

Event is only for enrolled students, staff members & GUC Graduates 

***Buses available after the concert

**** FOR REGISTRATION ****

** Enrolled students & staff members will have access to event using their GUC ID
*** All GUC graduates have to register on the following guest list to:
http://online.guc.edu.eg/MBAOnline/Systems/ActivitiesEvent/Music%20concert%20registration.aspx 
*** Graduates will have to bring their GUC ID, Alumni card, or their GUC graduation certifticate as a proof that you are GUCIAN
** If you come without any of the above, you will not have access to the event even if your name is registered on the list.

الأكاديمية الموسيقية بالجامعة الألمانية تقدم لكم :
حفلة كايروكي والفنانة طاهرة بالتعاون مع Hi Wave و تحت رعاية Scratch
يفتتح الحفل دي جي ايميل
الحفل مخصص لطلبة الجامعة الألمانية وخريجيها والعاملين بها 


**** للتسجيل في الحفل ****
*** على طلبة الجامعة الالمانية دخول الحفل باستخدام GUC ID  الخاص بهم 
***بالنسبة للخريحين عليكم تسجيل بياناتكم في قائمة الحضور ادناه :
http://online.guc.edu.eg/MBAOnline/Systems/ActivitiesEvent/Music%20concert%20registration.aspx 
** على الخريجين احضار ما يثبت التحاقهم بالجامعة سواء  GUC ID  او شهادة التخرج او بطاقة
Alumni Card 
** لن يسمح لكم بالدخول في حال عدم توفر اي من الوثائق المذكورة اعلاه التي تبثت التحاقك بالجامعة حتى وان قمت بالتسجيل في قائمة الحضور

فرقة مسرح الجامعة الالمانية GUC TCS
و مركز الانتاج الاعلامي بالجامعة الالمانية

Remember the famous Toby Allen’s monsters we introduced before? 
Well, These monsters, representing mental illnesses are now unleashed!!!
Come join us and help raise awareness for Mental Illness by chasing them in a route 13 kilometers long. 

FOR EVERY PARTICIPANT, INSPIRE WILL DONATE 10 EGP TO SUPPORT  MENTAL ILLNESS PATIENTS.
 
Date: Friday 27 Jan. 
Time: 7:30AM
Location: gate (5) of the GUC in 5th settlement. 
Cycling distance: 13k
You DON'T have to bring a bike, bikes are supplied to you just fill in the form that you will rent a bike.

Meet us and be a part of the enormous flow and cycle to #BrakeTheSilence

Feel the challenge and pedal along ;) 

Fill in this form NOW:
https://goo.gl/forms/wOBXqUZNQ3o6RjHh2

#BrakeTheSilence
#StayTuned

Relive the amazing Disney movies with a beautiful selection of your favorite songs presented by The GUC Music Ensemble.

Location: GUC Music Hall D5.01
Buses available after the concert - short round (Rehab, Nasr City, Mohandessin, Heliopolis, Maadi)

If you are not an enrolled GUC student or a current GUC staff member, please register via the following guest list to be able to attend the event. Please note that the list will close on Thursday 17th at 11 a.m. 
(We are very sorry, we had to close the list earlier and please check our pinned post for more details)
http://online.guc.edu.eg/MBAOnline/Systems/ActivitiesEvent/Music%20concert%20registration.aspx

column1: Frozzy twist Al Rehab New Branch Opening
column2:

Waiting for all of you!
The address: 306, Commercial Market beside sale sucre, Al Rehab city
لكل سكان الرحاب، و لكل اللى بيحبوا يخرجوا فى الرحاب، فروزى تويست بتدعوكم لأفتتاح أجدد فرع ليها فى الرحاب، مستنينكوا كلوكوا و جهزوا نفسوكوا عشان هيكون فى مفاجئات كتييييير
العنوان: الرحاب السوق التجارى محل 306 بجوار sale sucre

Did you ever feel that people are underestimating you, not understanding you, and mainly not knowing your actual role in the community, due to some misconceptions being spread around? Well, misconceptions may vary, However, we all agree on the fact that misconceptions will always lead to a conflict.
By nature, people assume that they are transparent enough and hence don't need to spend the time and the effort to clear up their vision, intentions or opinions. Feeling understood is an essential need. Once satisfied, people feel more at peace with themselves and with the surrounding community. 

Visit us at the Platform Area starting from Wednesday 16th of March, till Saturday 19th of March 2016, to have all of your misconceptions cleared OUT!
Also, don't miss the chance to try out the most BRILLIANT INVENTION OF THE DECADE! VIRTUAL REALITY!
Come and play some of the most amazing, and thrilling games, using the Virtual Reality glasses, exclusively in our booth.

#انت_فاهم_غلط
#IEEE_GUC
#NowYouSeeMe
